parts.text: {"word":"arrange","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"配置する、整理する、整える","english_definition":"to put things in a particular order or position.","examples":[{"sentence":"She arranged the flowers in a vase.","translation":"彼女は花瓶に花を活けた。"},{"sentence":"He arranged the books on the shelf alphabetically.","translation":"彼は本棚の本をアルファベット順に並べた。"},{"sentence":"The furniture was arranged to maximize space.","translation":"家具はスペースを最大限に活用できるように配置された。"}],"collocations":["arrange flowers (花を活ける)","arrange furniture (家具を配置する)","arrange books (本を並べる)","arrange items (品物を整理する)"],"synonyms":["organize","order","position","place","set out","group","classify"],"antonyms":["disarrange","scatter","disorder","jumble"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"手配する、準備する、取り決める","english_definition":""to plan or organize something in advance.","examples":[{"sentence":"I'll arrange a meeting for next week.","translation":"来週の会議を手配します。"},{"sentence":"She arranged for a taxi to pick her up.","translation":"彼女はタクシーを手配して迎えに来てもらった。"},{"sentence":"We need to arrange accommodation for the guests.","translation":"お客様の宿泊施設を手配する必要があります。"}],"collocations":["arrange a meeting (会議を手配する)","arrange a party (パーティーを手配する)","arrange a trip (旅行を手配する)","arrange accommodation (宿泊施設を手配する)","arrange transportation (交通手段を手配する)"],"synonyms":["organize","plan","prepare","schedule","coordinate","fix","settle"],"antonyms":["disorganize","cancel","undo"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"編曲する、アレンジする","english_definition":""to adapt a piece of music for performance by particular instruments or voices.","examples":[{"sentence":"He arranged the song for a string quartet.","translation":"彼はその歌を弦楽四重奏のために編曲した。"},{"sentence":"The composer arranged the folk tune for orchestra.","translation":"作曲家はその民謡をオーケストラのために編曲した。"}],"collocations":["arrange a song (歌を編曲する)","arrange music (音楽を編曲する)"],"synonyms":["adapt","score","orchestrate","transpose"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"取り決まる、合意する","english_definition":"to come to an agreement or understanding.","examples":[{"sentence":"We arranged to meet at the cafe.","translation":"カフェで会うことにした。"},{"sentence":"It was arranged that he would speak first.","translation":"彼が最初に話すことになった。"}],"collocations":["arrange to meet (会うことにする)","arrange for something (～を手配する)"],"synonyms":["agree","settle","decide","determine"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"フランス語の「arranger」（整える、配置する）から派生。さらに古くは、ラテン語の「ad-」（～へ）と「rangiare」（列に並べる）に由来。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/əˈreɪndʒ/","syllables":"ar-range"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["arrange","arranges"],"past_simple":"arranged","past_participle":"arranged","present_participle":"arranging"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**arrange**」は、大きく分けて「配置する、整理する」と「手配する、取り決める」の2つの意味があります。前者は物理的な配置、後者は計画や準備に関わる意味合いです。音楽の文脈では「編曲する」という意味になります。自動詞としては、「取り決まる、合意する」という意味で使われます。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I will arrange you a taxi.","correct":"✓ I will arrange a taxi for you.","note":"「arrange」は、人に直接何かを手配するというよりも、「arrange something for someone」という形で使われます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I arranged him to meet me.","correct":"✓ I arranged for him to meet me.","note":"「arrange for someone to do something」という形で、「誰かが～するように手配する」という意味になります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["arrangement (名詞: 配置、整理、手配、取り決め、編曲)","arranger (名詞: 手配する人、編曲家)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**arrange**」は、物をきちんと並べたり、何かを計画したり手配したりするときに使う言葉です。例えば、部屋の家具を「arrange（配置する）」、旅行の計画を「arrange（手配する）」のように使います。音楽を「arrange（編曲する）」ということもあります。少し難しい単語ですが、日常会話やビジネスシーンでよく使われるので、覚えておくと便利です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Please **arrange** the chairs in rows.","translation":"椅子を列に並べてください。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"配置する"},{"sentence":"I need to **arrange** a doctor's appointment.","translation":"医者の予約を手配する必要があります。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"手配する"},{"sentence":"The composer **arranged** the song for piano and voice.","translation":"作曲家はその歌をピアノとボーカルのために編曲した。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"編曲する"},{"sentence":"We **arranged** to meet at the station.","translation":"駅で会うことにした。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"取り決まる"}]}
